english.segment1: Bye, Bye, Bye. Bye, Bye, Bye. Bye, Bye, Bye
english.segment2: I'm doin this tonight. You're probably gonna start a fight. I know this can't be right. Hey baby, come on. I loved you endlessly. When you weren't there for me. So now it's time to leave and make it alone. I know that I can't take no more. It ain't no lie. I wanna see you out that door. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment3: Don't wanna be a fool for you. Just another player in your game for two. You may hate me but it ain't no lie. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment4: Don't really wanna make it tough. I just wanna tell you that I had enough. It might sound crazy. But it ain't no lie. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment5: Just hit me with the truth. Now girl you're more than welcome to. So give me one good reason. Baby come on. I live for you and me. And now I really come to see. That life would be much better once you're gone
english.segment6: I know that I can't take no more. It ain't no lie. I wanna see you out that door. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment7: Don't wanna be a fool for you. Just another player in your game for two. You may hate me but it ain't no lie. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment8: Don't really wanna make it tough, I just wanna tell you that I had enough. It might sound crazy. But it ain't no lie. Baby, bye, bye, bye
english.segment9: I'm giving up I know for sure. I don't wanna be the reason. For your love no more. Bye, Bye
english.segment10: I'm checkin out. I'm signin off. Don't wanna be the loser. And I've had enough
english.segment11: I don't wanna be your fool. In this game for two. So I'm leavin' you behind. Bye, bye, bye..
english.segment12: I don't wanna make it tough. Make it tough. But I had enough. And it ain't no lie. Bye, bye, baby. Bye, Bye. Don't wanna be a fool for you. Just another player in your game for two. I don't wanna be your fool. But it ain't no lie. Baby, bye, bye, bye..
english.segment13: Don't really wanna make it tough. I just wanna tell you that I had enough. Might sound crazy. But it ain't no lie
